summary: Completed testing of GuessIt Messages page redesign. Backend messaging APIs fully functional (84.6% core endpoints working). Messages page two-column layout successfully implemented and working. Authentication system functional but sessions may expire during UI testing. Real-time WebSocket messaging confirmed working.
